abstract: Discussing a common business problem candidly, the owner of an auction company was cautioned, would make her look stupid, and she was warned about wearing green for a speech.
snippet: Discussing a common business problem candidly, the owner of an auction company was cautioned, would make her look stupid, and she was warned about wearing green for a speech.
lead_paragraph: What you wear, how you speak and even how you stand are part of your image. In China, those are not the details that really matter — especially for foreigners.

headline.main: In China, Success Depends on Mastering a Different Set of Details
